motd.title: Message from the Dreadnought Discord
motd.body:
Help QA Track Down This Bug! Nafie is looking for logs relating to a bug that causes the game to hang when both teams are close to winning (96/96, etc) and players either receive a crash or are booted back to hangar unexpectedly, completely skipping the end of match screen.
If you are experiencing this bug please contact DN_Nafie#5673 (Discord) to send her your logs!
--
Release Summary 2.6.1: - Added a tool that allows switching the modules to Azerty keys instead of the default of Qwerty - Fixed a bug that would cause the menu icons to render at abnormal sizes for some people
